graphql.query:
query {
    getAllAdminListings(secret: "secret") {
        id
        listing_id
        listing_title
        description
        street
        city
        postal_code
        price
        email
        username
    }
}

query {
    searchListingByCity(city: "Toronto") {
        id
        listing_id
        listing_title
        description
        street
        city
        postal_code
        price
        email
        username
    }
}

query {
    searchListingByPostalCode(postal_code: "M3K1E2") {
        id
        listing_id
        listing_title
        description
        street
        city
        postal_code
        price
        email
        username
    }
}

query {
    searchListingByName(listing_title: "holiday inn") {
        id
        listing_id
        listing_title
        description
        street
        city
        postal_code
        price
        email
        username
    }
}
